[[Image:Rain House Pin.png|thumb|200px|right|A map showing the location of Rain House on the continent of Westeros.]]
'''Rain House''' is a castle in [[the Stormlands]], the region controlled by [[House Baratheon]] of [[Storm's End]]. It is the seat of [[House Wylde]]. The castle is located south-east of Storm's End, near the eastern tip of a peninsula extending into the [[Narrow Sea]]. It overlooks the southern coastline of [[Shipbreaker Bay]], south of the island of [[Tarth]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/storms-end/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Storm's End entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Rain House is the seat of House Wylde. It lies on the far eastern edge of Cape Wrath.
